name: Famiguitar (Universal)
description:
Famiguitar is a guitar musical instrument application that simulates the sound of 8-bit video game console.
You can play the guitar easily without the guitar skills.

[Features]
- 16 codes can be set from 144 chords. (12 keys by 12 types)
- 5 waves are supported. (Pulse wave (Duty cycle 12.5% / 25% / 50% / 75%) / Triangle wave)
- Because six strings separately sound it, the arpeggio is possible.
- Retina display 960-by-640 resolution is supported.

[How To Play]
- Touch the "Play" button at the cyan panel.
- Select a chord at the red panel.
- Slide fingers at the yellow panel.

[How To Edit Chords]
- Touch the "Chord" button at the cyan panel.
- Select a key at the green panel.
- Select a chord type at the blue panel.

[How To Select Wave]
- Touch the "Wave" button at the cyan panel.
- Select a wave at the yellow panel.
